title: Dragons and Demons
description: Every kingdom Rezkin touches has shattered, and the turbulence in his homeland is spreading across the Souelian. From the shards of kingdoms past, he begins to forge a new empire. But there is a price to pay for power, and the balance has come due. When Rezkin is confronted by something mysterious and ancient, he is stolen from his intended path and driven toward shocking revelations about his identity. With every whisper of knowledge comes new dangers and one certainty.Rezkinâ€™s past has finally caught up with him, and the mad king Caydean is playing a darker game than anyone realized.
author: Kel Kade
